title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
summary: The adventures of a legendary concierge at a famous European hotel and his friendship with a young employee.

title: Superbad
summary: Two high school friends try to buy alcohol for a party in hopes of becoming popular before graduation.

title: The Hangover
summary: Three friends try to piece together the events of a wild bachelor party in Las Vegas.

title: Bridesmaids
summary: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid over who is the bride's best friend spirals out of control.

title: Hot Fuzz
summary: A top London cop is reassigned to a quiet village where a series of grisly accidents take place.

title: 21 Jump Street
summary: Two underachieving cops are sent back to high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

title: Step Brothers
summary: Two middle-aged, immature men become stepbrothers when their parents marry.

title: Deadpool
summary: A wisecracking mercenary with accelerated healing powers hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life.

title: The Mask
summary: A bank clerk discovers a magical mask that transforms him into a manic superhero.

title: Zombieland
summary: A shy student, a gun-toting tough guy, and two sisters team up to survive a zombie apocalypse.

title: 3 Idiots
summary: Two friends search for their long-lost companion. They revisit their college days and rediscover the important lessons they learned during their studies.

title: Chupke Chupke
summary: A debt-ridden young man attempts suicide, but is rescued only to find that his luck is finally turning.

title: Hera Pheri
summary: Three hapless individuals get caught up in a scheme involving a ransom, a gangster, and a lot of confusion.

title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
summary: A gangster, Munna, attempts to fulfill his fatherâ€™s dream of making him a doctor. However, his unique approach leads to chaos and heartwarming moments.

title: Welcome
summary: A man gets into trouble when he falls in love with the sister of a gangster, leading to a series of comical situations involving both families.

title: Dhamaal
summary: Four friends embark on a wild journey to find a hidden treasure. They encounter mischief, rivalry, and hilarious situations.

title: No Entry
summary: A happily married man with a seemingly perfect life finds himself in a whirlwind of hilarious complications when his friend tries to pursue extramarital affairs.

title: Andheri Raat Mein Diya Tera
summary: A group of friends finds themselves in a spooky mansion for a night of fun, but things take a hilarious turn as they encounter a series of strange occurrences.

title: Bheja Fry
summary: A middle-class man invites a government employee with a quirky personality to his dinner party, only to find his life turned upside down with endless absurdities.

title: Pati, Patni Aur Woh
summary: A man finds himself juggling between his loyal wife, his extramarital affair, and his conscience, leading to a series of hilarious misunderstandings.
